doc.title: Divorce Lemonade
doc.plot: 13 year old Sarah just found her dad, drunk, and passed out in the front yard of their freshly built, 'cookie cutter', home in the deep suburbs. She's got to take care of this before her mother finds him and calls the police. Obviously too small in frame to drag him out of there, she devises a plan to build a lemonade stand on top of him until he sobers up and leaves on his own. Sarah's cover is put to the test when Mom and her new boyfriend, Bob, emerge from the house heading for the nine to five work day. If Sarah can keep her cool, she might just get away with this and keep her father out of jail, if not...
